title: Tennis Manager 25
description:
Dive into the most advancesd tennis management experience to date. Manage your academy, develop your staff and facilities, and recruit the best players from junior to pro, across both men's and women's circuits.

Forge the champions of tomorrow and shape the future of tennis!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Dive into the most advancesd tennis management experience to date. Manage your academy and recruit the best players from junior to pro!
<!--text-->
**GAME DESCRIPTION**

Take control of a tennis academy and dive into an immersive, strategic experience. With over 2,000 tournaments ranging from the junior circuit to the professional stage and 5,000 players available, you’ll have everything you need to develop the champions of tomorrow.

**GAME OVERVIEW**

Become the best manager by running the largest academy on the circuit. Create your own academy or manage an existing one. Oversee every aspect of your academy: scout young talents, manage finances, upgrade facilities, and make key strategic decisions.

Impress your peers and accept the role of National Team Captain to lead your country to the world championship title!

Coach your player or your team in real time with an improved 3D engine, and adjust your tactics for each opponent to win the most prestigious titles.

Create your own player and take them to the top of world tennis.

**WHAT’S NEW THIS SEASON**

**A New Youth Academy**

The standout feature of this edition! Manage a youth academy dedicated to developing young players. Set up modern facilities, design tailored training programs for each talent, assign them a mentor, and track their progress. You'll be responsible for scouting young prodigies, adjusting their development, deciding when they’re ready to join your roster, and launching them onto the professional stage!

**Additional Tracking Tools**

With the follow up, you now have access to even more data on the supervision screen to monitor your players' performance in detail. Focus on a single player in your roster or follow all matches of your entire team—and even coach them on the court!

You can also follow any match of your choice with spectator mode, a brand-new feature that lets you watch any match on the circuit. It’s a great way to strategize against your next opponent!

The mini agenda revolutionizes planning with an intuitive, redesigned interface for smoother organization. Easily track upcoming competitions, training sessions, and key moments throughout the season for each of your players.

The new ranking evolution graph by age provides a dynamic and comparative visualization of players’ progression in the rankings based on their age. This tool helps you assess a player's early development compared to others, making it easier to identify promising talents and future stars.

**An Enhanced Tactical System**

The 5th opus of the franchise introduces new game plans! Experience even deeper tactical management, built on a meticulous analysis of modern tennis and its match statistics. After years of studying professional circuit strategies, we’ve refined our tactical model to deliver an even more realistic gameplay experience. You can now design detailed game plans tailored to your players’ strengths, your opponents’ weaknesses, and the specific conditions of each match. Every factor matters : the surface, mental and physical aspects, and the management of key moments in a match!

The artificial intelligence of players has once again been improved to provide more realistic behaviors and increased responsiveness on the court. New player reactions and enhanced cinematics have also been added to make the experience even more immersive.

Our Eagle View feature allows you to watch a slow-motion replay of close calls. A long-awaited addition by many managers!

For newcomers to tennis, you can now switch to simplified tactics mode! This setting streamlines managerial choices with intuitive sliders, making tactical decision-making more accessible than ever.

A brand-new match view is now available, allowing you to watch the entire match or key sequences in accelerated mode while retaining the ability to jump in and take control at any time. This new match view is called Match Beats.

**More Advanced Customization & Editing**

Express your style with extensive customization options. Equip your players with a wide choice of accessories and outfits, adapting their appearance as their career progresses.

A long-awaited feature by our community, the in-game content editor now allows you to modify player names, photos, and attributes, as well as tournament names and logos, offering a fully customizable experience tailored to your preferences.

And since good news never comes alone… Fast Forward now lets you automatically skip ahead to a specific date, allowing those eager to accelerate their career and the circuit’s progression to do so. So, who will be world No.1 in 2035?

Tennis Manager 2025 introduces more new features than any previous edition! Immerse yourself in the most advanced tennis management experience yet, and join the community to share your strategies and connect with fellow tennis enthusiasts!

Follow us on Discord and our social media channels to stay up to date with upcoming updates!
